t2.Vengeful Curse: When hit by an enemy, attacker's DMG is reduced by 70% for 3 sec. This effect only activates once in 40 sec, and cannot be dispelled.
t2.Goddess Blessing: Increases Crit Chance of all allies by 150. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 50 additional Crit Chance applies.
t2.Inner Peace: Heal all allies by 1% every sec and increases CC Resist by 75. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 0.3% additional healing per sec and 25 additional CC Resist apply.
t2.Blessing of Mana: Mana recovery per second rises by 250%.
t2.Swiftness: Increases ATK Spd of all allies by 150. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 50 additional ATK Spd applies.
